page.title: 08My Sunday
page.content: On Sunday I{awoke}at eight o'clock. After eating a bowl of Frosties for {breakfast,}I went upstairs and got dressed, then I watched "Hunter" on the television- I had recorded it on the video the night before. My father started to cook the{dinner.}We had lamb, mint sauce, rost potatoes, carrots, cabbage, peas and gravy, then a drink of Lemonade.{After dinner}my mother decided to wash my hair- I hate having my hair washed in the afternoon. I went to Wepre Park where there was a big fete- I walked up into the Bluebell-covered woods, and on to Ewloe castle. My brother and I played hide and seek within the walls. At {tea-time}we ate ham sandwiches and drank milk. We watched "Murder She Wrote" on television and went to{bed at 9.30.
